page.title: 01Introduction.
page.content: This area contains part of the village of{Steeple Bumpstead,}the village of {Helion's Bumpstead,}and some small farming settlements.Of Steeple Bumpstead, the parts included are {Water Lane, Church Street and North {Street,}the new estates of{Bower Hall {and Churchfields}and the large recreation area which is the centre of much village life and which has the unusual name of{The Camping Close. Also dealt with here is the{split-site {primary school,}known to villagers as {The Old School}and{The New School.}The Old School, on Church Street is the Junior School, and was originally the old National School. The New School, in Bower Hall Drive is the Infant School, which was built in 1977 as phase 1 of a new Primary school replacing the old British school on North St.Phase 2 is due to start-1986.
